summary: This file contains a suite of unit tests for the HIV modeling components of the simulation framework. It sets up simulations, invokes various HIV-related events and health system interactions, and checks outcomes such as infection handling, treatment initiation, ART continuity, mother‑to‑child transmission, and symptom progression.
business_intent: Validate that the HIV module accurately represents disease dynamics, treatment pathways, and health system behavior within the broader simulation, ensuring reliable outputs for epidemiological analysis and policy evaluation.
